name: Wasp
skill: Occasionally stings the pet with the highest cooldown, advancing it. Also applies the Pollinated mutation.

name: Turtle
skill: Slowing aura that makes sprinklers last longer.

name: Toucan
skill: Provides a passive buff to all tropical plants within a 25-stud radius, increasing their size by a factor of 1.6 and their variant chance by 1.1.

name: Tarantula Hawk
skill: Applies the Pollinated mutation to a nearby fruit.

name: Starfish
skill: Passively gains an additional 6.14 experience points per second.

name: Squirrel
skill: Planting seeds has a small chance to not be consumed. Rarer plants have a lower chance.

name: Spotted Deer
skill: When harvesting berry plants, there is a chance the fruit will remain.

name: Snail
skill: Increases the chance of a lucky harvest.

name: Silver Monkey
skill: Grants a 3% chance to get your fruit back when you sell it.

name: Seagull
skill: When shoveling plants (but not fruits), there is a 3.28% chance that the Seagull will find and return the same seed.

name: Sea Turtle
skill: Every 10 minutes, the Sea Turtle imparts its wisdom to a random pet, granting it 1,000 experience points.

name: Sea Otter
skill: Waters plants randomly like a watering can.

name: Seal
skill: When selling pets, there is a 2.4% chance that the Seal will retrieve the pet's egg equivalent for you.

name: Scarlet Macaw
skill: Every 11.48 minutes, there is a 16.25% chance that the Scarlet Macaw will apply the 'Verdant' mutation to a random crop.

name: Rooster
skill: Crows at dawn, providing a temporary boost to all player activities.

name: Red Giant Ant
skill: Grants a small chance to duplicate harvested plants & Candy. Increased chance for candy type plants.

name: Red Fox
skill: Periodically goes to another player's plot and attempts to steal a seed from a random plant.

name: Raccoon
skill: Occasionally steals (duplicates) a fruit from another player's plot and gives it to you.

name: Queen Bee
skill: Occasionally refreshes the ability of the pet with the highest cooldown. Also applies the Pollinated mutation.

name: Praying Mantis
skill: Prays, then gives plants in its AOE a buff that increases the chance of them becoming Golden.

name: Polar Bear
skill: Occasionally sets a random nearby fruit cold, turning it into Chilled with a small chance for Frozen.

name: Pig
skill: Occasionally releases a fertilizing AOE that boosts plant size and mutation chance.

name: Peacock
skill: Every 9.57 minutes, the Peacock has a chance to fan its tail, which advances the ability cooldowns of all your pets by 60.92 seconds.

name: Petal Bee
skill: Applies the Pollinated mutation to a nearby fruit.

name: Panda
skill: Waddles to bamboo, eats it, and grants bonus Sheckles (more than normal value).

name: Pack Bee
skill: Increases the player's inventory capacity for honey and other bee products.

name: Ostrich
skill: When a pet hatches from an egg, the Ostrich adds between 1 and 4.66 to its age value.

name: Owl
skill: Grants a bonus experience per second gain to all active pets.

name: Orangutan
skill: Can skillfully harvest fruit from tall trees, increasing the yield.

name: Orange Tabby
skill: Naps in a random spot in your farm, emitting an aura that boosts nearby fruit size.

name: Night Owl
skill: Grants a bonus experience per second gain to all active pets.

name: Moth
skill: Sings to a random pet and magically restores its hunger.

name: Moon Cat
skill: Naps to boost nearby fruit size and grants a chance for Night-type plants to replant when harvested.

name: Monkey
skill: Has a chance to find a banana, a high-value item, every 10 minutes.

name: Mole
skill: Will occasionally dig down to find gear or Sheckles.

name: Mimic Octopus
skill: A truly unique pet, the Mimic Octopus shapeshifts into another one of your pets every 19.56 seconds and copies its passive trait.

name: Kiwi
skill: Occasionally reduces the hatch time of the egg with the most hatch time left.

name: Honey Bee
skill: Applies the Pollinated mutation to a nearby fruit.

name: Hedgehog
skill: Makes prickly fruit grow bigger.

name: Grey Mouse
skill: Has a chance to find and retrieve lost seeds from the garden.

name: Golden Lab
skill: Occasionally digs up a random seed at a higher chance.

name: Giant Ant
skill: Grants a small chance to duplicate harvested plants & Candy. Increased chance for candy type plants.

name: Frog
skill: Will occasionally advance a nearby plant's growth by 24 hours.

name: Flamingo
skill: Every 4 minutes, the Flamingo will stand on one leg for 14 seconds, causing all plants and fruits within a 13-stud radius to grow 16 times faster.

name: Firefly
skill: Illuminates a small area at night, revealing hidden items.

name: Echo Frog
skill: Will occasionally advance a nearby plant's growth by 24 hours.

name: Dragonfly
skill: Every now and then, turns a fruit to gold, giving it the Golden mutation.

name: Dog
skill: Attempts to dig up a seed with a 10% success chance.

name: Disco Bee
skill: Occasionally has a chance to give a nearby fruit the Disco mutation.

name: Deer
skill: When harvesting berry plants, there is a chance the fruit will remain.

name: Crab
skill: Every 6.12 minutes, the Crab will pinch a random player, earning you between 260 and 460 Sheckles.

name: Cow
skill: Emits a fertilizing aura that boosts nearby plant growth speed.

name: Cooked Owl
skill: Grants bonus experience per second gain to all active pets. Occasionally burns or cooks a random nearby fruit.

name: Chicken Zombie
skill: Decreases the time needed to hatch other eggs and occasionally gives a nearby fruit the Zombified mutation.

name: Chicken
skill: Decreases the time needed to hatch other eggs.

name: Caterpillar
skill: Boosts the growth rate of nearby Leafy plants.

name: Cat
skill: Naps in a random spot in your farm, emitting an aura that boosts nearby fruit size.

name: Butterfly
skill: Removes 5 mutations from a plant to grant it the Rainbow mutation.

name: Bunny
skill: Runs to carrots, eats them, and grants bonus Sheckles (more than normal value).

name: Brown Mouse
skill: Scurries through the garden, occasionally finding dropped coins from visitors.

name: Blood Owl
skill: Grants a bonus experience per second gain to all active pets.

name: Blood Kiwi
skill: Occasionally reduces the hatch time and boosts egg hatch speed.

name: Blood Hedgehog
skill: Makes prickly fruit have an increased variant chance and grow bigger.

name: Black Bunny
skill: Searches for rare four-leaf clovers, providing a small luck boost to the player.

name: Bee
skill: Applies the Pollinated mutation to a nearby fruit.

name: Bear Bee
skill: Applies the Honey Glazed mutation to a nearby fruit.
